comment: She was fine. She was kinda whiney as a professor though when students did not do perfectly on an assignment.

Does not have clear grading rubrics and copies everything from another professor. She disappears for weeks at a time and takes 3 months to grade one assignment. She also assigns a large term project the last week of class. Try to take someone else if possible.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--So many papers

comment: Slow grader, Failing grade on an assignment coming in on the final day of class with uncertain criteria of why it was failing, no rubric attached despite the assignment having a rubric

Assignments are unclear. Everything is much more complicated and she makes it more difficult that it has to be. Horrible at explaining instructions and responding to emails. She barely posts the modules, went away for weeks at a time and we didn't even get to most of the assignments. She won't work with u and doesn't care about your grade. Avoid!
rating_tags: So many papers--Graded by few things

comment: Just teaches jargon and how to make things more complicated than they need to be. She barely teaches, leaves class early, procrastinates on grading, and doesn't even stick to her own schedule. We had an assignment worth 15% of our grade just be a simple 1 page mock email followed by a 7+ page research paper over a fake topic we made up be 20%.What?
rating_tags: Group projects--Lots of homework--So many papers

comment: This class is so disorganized I dont think we will even complete the scheduled work. There are not clear due dates and it is difficult to contact the professor. I would not take this class again.
rating_tags: Beware of pop quizzes--Graded by few things--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: I expect to get an A for this class, you will have no problems passing this class as long as you do the assignments and show up for class. She makes pop quizzes that you just have to write down your name and get 100. Again, you will have many assignments, but not exactly boring essays.

Not a hard class but she makes it hard, the instructions are very unclear for each assignment. When you try to reach out for more explanation after a three day waiting period she will respond with re-read the instructions. Very difficult grader if the assignment is not perfectly up to her unexplained standards every point she can take off she will.

Dropped this class immediately after seeing the structure. Believe the other reviews on here describing how scattered the course contents are. Navigating the weekly assignments is a chore, and a lot of missed points will be due to a lack of effective communication from the professor. Funny... a communications professor with bad communication skills

Easy course to take. If you do the work correctly , you get an A. Way too many assignments. She confuses herself and the class. Too much group work. Each week it seemed like you joined a new group. We had groups for everything. Very disorganized. Will not take again
rating_tags: Lots of homework--EXTRA CREDIT--So many papers

comment: LOTS of group work and individual assignments with NO feedback. Professor does not respond to emails per her syllabus. Feedback given, or grades from submitted assignments was typically returned 30+ days after. Minimal lessons taught. Course syllabus did not match assignments. This course was a WASTE of my time.

At least for my section, she was more like the reviews from 2017 vs 2018. I took this online to have a more flexible schedule, but with how she ran the class, you essentially had to be online at specific days during the week, most of which I couldn't make since I worked those days. DON'T take this class if you're looking for schedule flexibility.

She's a great professor. She gives a lot of opportunities to pass her class offering students extra credit assignment. She assigns weekly quizzes which you can refer to your text. I'll definitely take her class again.
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Clear grading criteria--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: She's a really helpful professor BUT her grading measurements are a little disorganized, you never know what grade you are going to get on an assignment BUT, she gives redemption for any assignment under 5% for re modification, which can really make the difference of a letter grade if you need it. Confused about recommending her LOL.

Amazing professor. She is fun and is very clear with assignment instructions. Plenty of time to complete assignments. The majority of these assignments are group projects, but relatively easy. I would definitely take her again.

I'd be careful with taking this professor online. She ignored my emails completely. (No reply, not even at the end of the semester.) Then decides to go MIA for a week and pretend that nothing happened. If you want to learn something stay away from this professor. All of the material she teaches can be found on quizlet.

Ignored her online students for an entire week, skipped material with no explanation, and didn't seem to even read our work. She counted points off for things I literally didn't do on two of my papers, and I had to ask her to grant me points back. No further explanation. I've never seen anything like it.

Takes forever to email you back email. Graded some of my assignments before they were due, but leaves the rest of the grades blank until weeks later. Unclear in every assignment. Jams unnecessary info in assignments and tries hard to seem like she knows what she is talking about. Her online TCOM class is horrible. Disorganized, Lazy, DON'T TAKE!!!!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Beautiful class, really easy and relatively informative. I got an A, and I took it online so I had a lot of free time to get stuff done.  I'd recommend this class highly.

I've taken her for English 1101 & 1102. She makes you work for your grade but she is understanding. She did give an opportunity to make up missed assignments at end of the semester. She is passionate about teaching. Overall, she is a great professor.

Taken as a hybrid class. Our last 3-4 assignments were group based which I hated because they were the majority of our final grade. Her grading style is VERY harsh, so if you mess up on an assignment or don't understand it 100% then get ready for a 0 and no chance to redo it. Overall decent class but glad to have it over with.

She is horrible. Very lazy with grades until the end of the semesters. Treats her students like they are in high school and she doesn't have any respect to her students. She is very confusing.  Its a easy A but she can make it difficult. Avoid her at all cost ..... there are better professor that teach this class.

She is a super lazy teacher. Expect a lot of things being unclear in her class. Show up and pretend you're listening and you'll be okay. Do the assignments and quizzes. Easy A, but annoying petty work

Professor Logan is one of my favorite professors, she keeps the class interesting and challenges you to expand how to think and perceive certain issues that you may discuss in class. She loves engaging the class in conversations but she does give essays which require a lot of writing. However, it's worth it and if you work hard you'll get an A.

I took this class online. She takes a long time to respond to student emails and didn't open the modules in a scheduled manner. She takes a long time to grade assignments. Final grades are to be submitted in a couple days and I still haven't received 5 grades from her. So I'm unsure what I'm making in this class.

This prof. was horriblelazy.  She grades unfairly- she doesn't really teach it (online class). She doesn't explain exactly what she wants but grades like she did. She chose certain assignments to open for amnesty( none which would have helped me). The assignments were not scheduled according to the syllabus and she takes forever to grade(months).
Best English class I've taken. She makes it interesting, especially for hands on learning and field trips

The directions for most assignments are unclear. She takes way too long to grade them as well. Turned in 8 so far and only received grades for 3 and its 3 months into class. She takes awhile to respond to emails. The answers to the quiz's are not directly found in the book. They're usually scenarios and you have to pick which one doesdoesn't apply
Great teacher. Very understanding. Class was interesting and engaging.

There were numerous written assignments, big one being a Mini-ethnography portfolio due at the end of the semester. Honestly, she is the worst teacher I've had at SPSU so far. She literally graded NOTHING and came to classes late consistently with no warnings. Why I got a B grade remains a mystery, since my submitted assignments were kept ungraded.
Doesn't grade assignment in a mannerly fashion. No clue if you're doing bad in the class until it is too late. Not a good teacher in my opinion.
Terrible, terrible teacher. Always late to class or doesn't show up without emailing us. Might as well be an online class, because everything is done through vista. Laziest teacher I have had.
Took her for English 1101, 1102, and TCOMM. Im actually gonna miss her, i could use an easy A every semester.
I took her for 1101 and 1102. Great professor if you pay attention to what she says and posts on Georgia Vista. I would recommend her. I am now in her TCOM class and it seems the same way.

Good teacher if you want an A. Gave us 5 projects. Only half the class presented and then we moved on. The final project was fun and easy. If you try to hard you'll just get mad and hate the class. Take it easy and make sure she knows who you are and you will get an A.
was a good teacher not that hard. was a little hard to know when things are do. She was very laid back
She was a great teacher who is very understanding. I took her for both 1101 & 1102.

Took her for an online class and she never answered emails. I got an A but she made it so difficult because she didn't communicate. Oh she takes forever to grade assignments. Two months in I submited 4 assignment and only 1 was graded so far
Very bad teacher, never showed up for class, made us buy a book that we only read half of. She never told us what was due, might as well of been an online class.

I understand that some people get frustrated by the lack of "education" you get in this class. She gives little to no feed back on work you have turned in. But it is a EASY CLASS that gives you time to work on the important classes. Would i recommend this teacher to my friends? Yes. its a easy A and gets a college requirement out of the way

Prof. Logan is a good prof. She made the class so easy so i can have more time for my major classes (got 4 major classes and her class). Great prof. and she is friendly, too. I wish i had her for Composition 1 & 2.
The only theacher I have had at SPSU to try to push politics on you.  Hard to do when you don't show up to teach but she managed.

SPSU does not care about English.  I understand it is a tech school but you will get more out of a second rate Atlanta high school class. She is just collecting a check.  Way to lower the value of the degree.

Same comments as the previous rater from 5/12. She managed to dodge a bullet by conveniently missing the deadline for the student evaluation forms, so she would have had a dozen bad marks on her record for being incompetent, unclear, and most of all uninterested in the job she has at spsu. IT IS AN EASY CLASS (got A), but you get nothing out of it.

The most irresponcible professor you will ever run into. She was late for every class, and decided not to show up for 6 of the classes without warning (including the first day). You will probably make an A, but be prepared to not learn anything and be extremely aggrivated at the teacher.

Assigns several assignments, only grades a few. Constantly late or missing. Her objectives are unclear. Attendendance is necessary, but don't be afraid to miss a couple days, she doesn't really check. With all that said, as long as you do most of the work and make yourself known in class, you should have an easy B, if not A.

Took Logan for EngCompI&II. She gives a lot of busy work, but its easy. She is understanding and is a fun person. Lots of conversations take place in her class, gets off subject a lot. Its VERY EASY TO GET AN A in this class! I recommend this class. Attendance accounts for part of your grade, but she doesnt mind or really even notice if youre late.
The class i took was pop culture and it wasnt hard. She can give a lot of work at once but its not hard. Only 1 paper and didnt get it back. easy class and she isnt boring. attendance is mandatory
She is a great teacher and she does not give very hard assignments. Regular attendance is a must.
Great teacher. Very understanding

I took this lady for ENG. 1101, 1102 and now for TCOM, she is VERY EASY... do not even think about taking her... I made A's in all her classes she is the best or one of them at SPSU... at first you get the impression that she will be hard but as the time goes on she is easy all semester... I would recommend her

she is so easy!!!!! She cancelled about a month's worth of class. All you have to do is show up and turn in your work! All the essays are opinionated so you basically get a completion grade! She is one of the easiest english teachers ever!
No Comments

So far the best professor I got at SPSU, take her if you can, she is very nice and you would not regret taking her, I took her for ENG. 1101 and 1102 and made A's in both and to be honest 1102 is easier than the first one... SHE IS GREAT!!!
Good teacher. Gives work in bunches. Easy A if you do your work.

She is easy and its almost an automatic A. Lotsa work and a buncha retarded crap. Class is a waste of time, half the time I just sat around and played computer games. Also, there are retarded discussions all the time. Take the class if you want a somewhat easy A, but if you don't want to waste your life then stay away.
Great Teacher, She is easy, but gives a lot of work. Se is very nice. Her class fills up fast.
Best English Teacher I have ever had
She is a very good teacher.  She loves to talk, so if you can get her to talk then you will most likely have no homework for that nite. She can give alot of work in bunches.
She is a good teacher, but gives alot of work at times!
Easy class.
